actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the Taiwan authorities should cooperate fully in the case of Henry Liu by delivering to the United States for trial those citizens of Taiwan charged by authorities in the United States in connection with the murder of Henry Liu.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Taiwan authorities should cooperate by delivering to the United States for trial those citizens of Taiwan charged by U.S. authorities with the murder of Henry Liu.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the Taiwan authorities should cooperate fully in the case of Henry Liu by delivering to the United States for trial those citizens of Taiwan charged by authorities in the United States in connection with the murder of Henry Liu.
